name: ruby2js-on-rails
description: Rails-like app running in JavaScript - Ruby2JS selfhost demo

scripts.dev:bun: DATABASE=better_sqlite3 RUNTIME=bun npm run build && bun node_modules/ruby2js-rails/server.mjs
scripts.dev:deno: DATABASE=better_sqlite3 RUNTIME=deno npm run build && deno run --allow-all node_modules/ruby2js-rails/server.mjs
